name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
Results-oriented Senior Software Engineer with 8 years of comprehensive experience in modern **JavaScript/TypeScript**, **Python**, and database management using **MongoDB**, **PostgreSQL**, and **MySQL**. Adept at building high-performance applications leveraging **Express.js**, **NestJS**, and **React** frameworks, with a strong focus on developing **RESTful API** and **GraphQL** solutions within the healthcare and financial sectors. My robust cloud experience encompasses **Azure** and **AWS**, supporting scalable deployments and operations.

Proficient in implementing **DevOps** practices to enhance CI/CD pipelines for efficient software delivery, ensuring applications meet compliance standards such as HIPAA and PCI DSS. Passionate about coaching team members and promoting agile methodologies, I excel in practical problem-solving and thrive in collaborative environments. I have also integrated **GenAI** technologies to elevate user experiences, while leveraging my fluency in **English** and **German** to enhance communication across teams.

experience.responsibilities:
- Developed scalable and efficient applications using **TypeScript**, **Python** (FastAPI), and modern frameworks like **React** (17-18) and **GraphQL**.
- Designed and implemented RESTful APIs ensuring robust data handling with **MongoDB** and **PostgreSQL**.
- Led the development of backend services with a focus on microservices architecture utilizing **Node.js**, **Express.js**, and **NestJS**.
- Collaborated on cross-functional teams to foster **DevOps** practices, optimizing CI/CD pipelines through tools like GitHub Actions and **Azure DevOps**.
- Delivered high-performance applications incorporating **GenAI** techniques, enhancing user engagement and operational efficiency.
- Coached and mentored junior developers in agile methodologies, best coding practices, and effective communication in both **English** and **German**.
- Maintained thorough testing strategies using **Jest**, **Cypress**, and **PyTest**, achieving over 90% test coverage across services.
- Engaged in pragmatism-driven development, iterating quickly while implementing comprehensive feature sets across all project stages.
- Integrated advanced analytics and visualization tools using **D3.js** and **Power BI Embedded**, generating key business insights from data across projects.
- Ensured compliance with relevant data protection regulations and standards throughout the software development lifecycle.

• Developed exceptional front-end applications using **React** (18), **TypeScript**, and **Next.js** to enhance user experience for financial products, showcasing innovative use of modern frameworks and libraries.
• Led the creation of a microservices-based architecture using **Node.js** (**Express.js**, **NestJS**) and **Python** (**Django**, **FastAPI**) to improve system scalability, maintainability, and throughput for processing over **10,000** transactions per minute.
• Engineered real-time transaction monitoring tools with **React**, **D3.js**, and **Power BI Embedded**, providing operations teams with immediate analytics capabilities to respond to anomalies swiftly.
• Established an event-driven architecture integrating **Kafka**, **RabbitMQ**, and **Azure Service Bus**, enabling seamless asynchronous communication and enhancing real-time transaction processing, particularly for compliance workflows.
• Constructed ETL pipelines leveraging **Python**, **Apache Airflow**, and **Azure Data Factory**, facilitating the ingestion of financial data from various sources, improving data accessibility within **24 hours** of data retrieval.
• Implemented AI/ML-powered fraud detection utilizing **scikit-learn**, **XGBoost**, and **Azure Machine Learning**, proactively identifying and flagging suspicious transaction activity impacting a user base of over **500,000**.
• Developed ML pipelines tailored for credit scoring, churn prediction, and transaction classification using **MLflow** and **Airflow**, ensuring real-time inferencing capabilities were integrated into backend services, enhancing decision-making efficiency.

Utilized **Python** and **TypeScript** to develop and optimize backend services for a global e-commerce platform, maximizing performance and scalability in key modules such as checkout and order fulfillment.
Engineered robust RESTful API and **GraphQL** solutions, ensuring data integration from **MongoDB** and **PostgreSQL** for efficient data retrieval under high traffic, improving database performance by over **30%**.
Designed responsive frontend applications using **React** (v18) and **NestJS**, implementing **Express.js** for server-side logic to enhance user interactions and reduce page load times by **25%**.
Employed event-driven architecture with **WebSockets**, **Kafka**, and **RabbitMQ** for seamless real-time updates and notifications, resulting in improved customer engagement and support resolution times by **40%**.
Implemented comprehensive caching strategies using **Redis** to significantly enhance application responsiveness, achieving an average of **50%** reduction in database reads.
Led the integration of AI/ML tools, such as **scikit-learn** and **TensorFlow**, to implement personalized recommendations, resulting in a **20%** increase in conversion rates based on user behavior.
Applied DevOps practices for continuous integration and deployment, utilizing **Kubernetes** and feature flags with **LaunchDarkly** for efficient rollouts and minimized risks during updates.
Coached junior developers on best practices in software development and agile methodologies, fostering a collaborative team environment and improving project delivery timelines by **15%**.
Ensured compliance with security and data protection standards through the implementation of **OAuth 2.0** and role-based access control (RBAC), safeguarding sensitive user data and ensuring GDPR compliance throughout the platform.
